content.rendered:
Whether you have questions about our company, our molecules, our clinical trials, requests for partnerships, or you want to talk all things science, we want to hear from you!

If you are a member of the investor community or media please use the following email addresses to contact our team.

Investor Contact
ir@scholarrock.com

Media Contact
media@scholarrock.com

If you have a medical grant proposal, please contact us at Grants_Giving@scholarrock.com

If you have business development inquiries, please contact us at bd@scholarrock.com

Please complete the contact form below, and we will get back to you shortly.

Address
301 Binney Street, 3rd Floor
Cambridge, MA 02142

Phone
857.259.3860
